name: Union Station – Kansas City, MO (service area includes KS side)
description: Pressed‑penny machine located across from the Science City entrance near the Rocky Mountain Chocolate Factory.

name: Deanna Rose Children’s Farmstead – Overland Park, KS
description: Seasonal penny press located outside the general store for kids visiting the farmstead.

name: Topeka Zoo
description: Pressed‑penny machine located by the giraffe exhibit; charges about $5 for six designs.
